name: Raptured! Free
description:
Disappointed that there was no rapture last May? Worried about what will happen if there is a rapture in the future? Prepare yourself with the most accurate rapture simulator ever created! (accuracy most definitely not guaranteed)

Featuring clean, retro graphics and simple yet addictive game play, Raptured! will have you practising for the coming apocalypse while competing for the high score with friends and other players around the world!

-pixel style retro graphics
-addictive endless runner style game play

features in the full version:
-real-time tracking of friend/global ranking
-gamecenter achievement support
